document_data.name: ''Rapier of Puncturing''
document_data.Powers: A ''rapier of puncturing'' was a ''+2 [[Wounding (weapon quality)|wounding]] rapier''. Its most dangerous ability, which was usable three times per day, was the ability to cause potentially severe blood loss by merely touching an enemy.
document_data.History: ''Rapiers of puncturing'' were popular weapons among the assassins of the [[Jaezred Chaulssin]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web enhancement/City of Wyrmshadows|6}}
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Nimor Imphraezl]], an [[assassin]], owned such a rapier.{{Cite web enhancement/City of Wyrmshadows|7}}
